name: inscrutably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not show emotions or thoughts and therefore is very difficult to understand or get to know: She smiled inscrutably. He was inscrutably silent. See
inscrutable
More examplesFewer examplesHe put his pen away, watching her inscrutably.She gave him an inscrutably intense smile.Dave looked at him inscrutably.
